name: Triplicata (itch)
description:
In this game, you must avoid the cubes! It is quite a relaxing but engaging game, perfect for playing on your phone on the bus or when you want to spend a minute or two being distracted from your work.

------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT: If on PC, you must have a touchscreen display / drawing tablet (does not need to have a screen) connected, otherwise it will not detect touch input

------------------------------------------------------------
